    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> ProposalRepository.findAllByCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc​(java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals in the database
    org.springframework.data.domain.Slice<Proposal> ProposalRepository.findAllByUserIdAndCreationDateBetweenOrderByUpvotesCountDesc​(java.lang.Long id, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals made by the user whose id is passed in the method in the database

    This method is used to find a slice between the given start and end date of all the proposals marked to the given team id in the database

    This method is used to find a slice of proposals by a pageable variable for pagination so that our proposals are visible in a stream

  • Uses of Proposal in com.soprabanking.ips.services

    Methods in com.soprabanking.ips.services that return Proposal
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Proposal ProposalService.saveProposal​(java.lang.String body)
    Creates and returns a new Proposal object that is made by a particular User according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal which is being created, id of the User who is creating the given Proposal and, Title of the Proposal Textual description of the Proposal. List of teams to which the Proposal has to be forwarded.
    Proposal ProposalService.shareProposal​(java.lang.String body)
    Shares and returns an existing Proposal object according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal which is being shared, List of teams with which the Proposal is being shared.
    Proposal ProposalService.updateProposal​(java.lang.String body)
    Updates and returns an existing Proposal object according to the specified Request Body String containing the following: id value of the Proposal which is being updated, New/Updated Title of the Proposal New/Updated Textual description of the Proposal.
    Methods in com.soprabanking.ips.services that return types with arguments of type Proposal
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Proposal> FeedService.fetchAllProposals​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of all the Proposal objects stored in database in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
    java.util.List<Proposal> FeedService.fetchUserProposals​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of all the Proposal objects created by a particular User in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
    java.util.List<Proposal> ProposalService.getDefault​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of all the Proposal objects shared with a given Team in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
